entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support DI Container mutability #91163
  • Incorrect nullable annotation on Validator.TryValidateValue's `value`? #91162
    8.0.0
  • Class serialized to an empty array [] with System.Text.Json #91155
  • [API Proposal]: Provide an `IUnknown` IID constant #91150
    9.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Add additional overloads for `Random.Next*` #90998
  • NativeAot reverse engineering capabilities compared to c/c++ #91157
  • GC does not correctly take into account available cache for a VM #81428
    8.0.0
  • DateTime.DaysInMonth minor performance tweaks #91103

PullRequests

Created

  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent (alternative version) #91160
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2253244 #91159
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Re-enable an assert in BigInteger #91158
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix Http2 MultiConnection test race conditions #91156
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91152
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Use reader/writer lock instead of mutex for `ComWrappers` RCW cache #91149
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix recording/replay of getExactClasses #90926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #91151
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2252827 #91144
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Rename EnC related defines #91146
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91071
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91072
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] Fix stack_limit handling #91095
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable SuperPMI collection of a libraries tests run #91101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Activate Quic Alpn Narrowing Test #91116
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Optimize liveness fixpoint computation #89328
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent #91138
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix Alpine Linux mono build #90251
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Allow for PublishAot and PublishSingleFile at the same time #91141
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [MacOS] CNamedPipe::Write - Writing message size to named pipe failed.: Broken pipe when testing with start-server-and-test #34953

Closed

  • Publishing Native AOT in Release mode still producing .pdb files #34959

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update IsTargetFrameworkCompatible check #34954
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Feature Suggestion] Disable execution of specific Roslyn analyzers or code fixes during build and design-time (live analysis) #69733

Closed

  • C# Laungage Service is crash if UNITY project contains class named "Program" inherit MonoBehaviour #69525
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Use raw strings in EditorFeatures tests #69729
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Cache regexes used for embedded language detection #69725
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • Add granular opt-in property for interceptors #69712
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix NRT annotations in ASP.net EA api #69726
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bind fully-typed lambda only once for error recovery #69695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Razor / blazor infer partial generic type specification #50357
  • CSS isolation does not work - wrong isolation set #50356
  • Perf regression: mapaction #50355
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #50354
  • is this image bug in blazor server .net7 #50353
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50351

Closed

  • Perf regression: json #50352
  • System.IO.FileNotFoundException -> Loading of assemblies failure #48508
    Discussions
  • Copy task in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing.targets has missing UseHardlinksIfPossible and UseSymlinksIfPossible #33757
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2253195 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Update NavMenu.razor to use project name #50194
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Add ProblemDetials.Extensions to ControllerBase.Problem and ControllerBase.ValidationProblem #50204
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix text field generator with explicit value. #49608
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2

Created

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net Maui Hybrid Blazor app publish issue #17018

Closed

  • SafeArea gets applied to any child controls even if you've disabled the safe area for the page #12417
    Backlog
  • SelectedItem for Picker show default data when ItemSource is set from vm for windows #16827
  • DisplayAlert not working on MacCatalyst and UWP #11766
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI CollectionView scrolling doesn't work #12643
    .NET 8 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17017
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [core] factory methods for registering services, part 2 #17004
    area/perf 🏎️, area/hosting 🧩

Updated

  • Ignore failures from newly added UITests temporarily #17003
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix Android text alignment in migrated projects #16986
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix for Spinner not disappearing in RefreshView #16997
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, i/regression

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Temporary Key is inserted as ForeignKey #31559
  • Can't find Guid.ToString() generating different cases in ef 6 to ef core migration guides #31558

Closed

  • Native AOT - Microsoft.Data.SQLite crashing on SqliteConnection.Open() #31541
  • RelationalConverterMappingHints fixedLength: true does not lead to a datatype of binary but to varbinary for byte[] #31556
